CONTROLS.SaveMacro: Save Particle and Filter Effects as Macro
CONTROLS.ClearFX: Clear Scene Particle and Filter Effects

Common.DisableAllHint: Setting this will disable effects for all users. It overrides the enable flag. It's mostly a safe guard to deactivate effects when migrations fail. You shouldn't need to set this yourself. After changing this setting, a manual reload is required.
Common.ClearParticleAndFilterEffectsContent: Permanently delete all Particle Effects and Filter Effects from this Scene?
Common.ResetPassiveParametersHint: Resets Particle and Filter parameters to their default values
Common.ResetPassiveSuccess: Particle and Filter parameters successfully reset
Common.Author: Author
Common.TileCreated: A new Tile was created for effect {effect}
Common.PermissionCreateHint: Allow users with the selected role or above to use FXMaster special effects through the scene controls.
Common.EnableTooltipsHint: Enables tooltip descriptions for Particle and Filter effect parameters.

Params.AnchorHint: Local coordinates of the origin between 0.0 and 1.0

ParamTooltips.Gamma: Midtone curve. Lower brightens midtones; higher darkens midtones.
ParamTooltips.Period: Cycle period for repeating animation, in milliseconds. Lower = faster cycles.
ParamTooltips.Duration: How long an effect or transition runs (fade or playback), in seconds.
ParamTooltips.Brightness: Overall scene or sprite brightness. 0 = black; 1 = original; >1 = brighter.
ParamTooltips.Contrast: Difference between light and dark. Higher values increase punch.
ParamTooltips.Noise: Strength of film grain / noise. Higher = more visible grain.
ParamTooltips.Density: How many particles spawn per area. Higher = busier effect. NOTE: Higher densities will have a greater impact on performance.
ParamTooltips.Opacity: Global transparency of the effect. 0 = invisible; 1 = fully opaque.
ParamTooltips.Tint: Apply a solid color tint. Toggle Apply to enable the tint color.
ParamTooltips.Speed: Motion/animation speed. Higher = faster movement or change.
ParamTooltips.Lifetime: Average life of particles and related frequency. Higher = longer-lived.
ParamTooltips.Blur: Blur radius or strength applied by the effect.
ParamTooltips.Bloom: Bloom intensityâ€”how strongly bright areas glow.
ParamTooltips.Sepia: Sepia toning amount. Higher = stronger vintage look.
ParamTooltips.Threshold: Brightness threshold; lower catches more pixels.
ParamTooltips.Direction: Orientation in degrees for emission or motion.
ParamTooltips.Animations: Select animation types for this effect.
ParamTooltips.Anchor: Local coordinates of the origin between 0.0 and 1.0.
ParamTooltips.Spin: Spin/rotation speed of elements. Higher = faster spin.
ParamTooltips.Parallel: Use parallel rays instead of radial.
ParamTooltips.Lacunarity: Spacing factor for fractal rays. Higher = denser detail.
ParamTooltips.FadePercent: Softens region edges by this percent for a smoother blend. Higher = more fade.
ParamTooltips.NoiseSize: Grain size scale. Higher = larger individual grains.
ParamTooltips.Wobble: Adds random side to side particle movement. Higher = more movement.
ParamTooltips.Displacement: Strength of warping on particle effect.
ParamTooltips.ThunderAware: React to audio peaks. NOTE: This is meant for Thunder, but will apply to any bass effect in audio so choose Channel accordingly.
ParamTooltips.ThunderChannels: Which audio channels to react to.
ParamTooltips.ThunderBassThreshold: Bass level required to trigger thunder reactions. Higher = less sensitive.
ParamTooltips.Variants: Choose a preset look for this effect.
ParamTooltips.Shadow: Enable a drop shadow for the particle sprites.
ParamTooltips.ShadowDistance: Offset distance of the drop shadow. Higher = further away.
ParamTooltips.ShadowBlur: Blur strength on the drop shadow.
ParamTooltips.ShadowOpacity: Opacity of the drop shadow. 0 = invisible; 1 = fully opaque.
ParamTooltips.ShadowOnly: Render only the drop shadow and hide the base particle sprites.
ParamTooltips.Splash: Enable rain splash effects alongside raindrops.
ParamTooltips.Orbit: Enables orbit around center of a container instead of an outward spread.
ParamTooltips.OrbitDistance: Distance from the center of a container for orbiting particles.
ParamTooltips.WobbleFrequency: Controls how fast particles wobble. Higher = faster wobble.
ParamTooltips.Streakiness: Controls how stretched and banded the filter is along the movement path. Lower values look more like uniform haze, higher values create longer streaks.
ParamTooltips.Lift: Controls how thick the filter is in the middle of each sheet compared to its edges. Lower values are more flat and even; higher values make the centers denser and the edges thinner, adding depth but reducing overall coverage.
ParamTooltips.Rainbow: Overrides Tint and enables a random cycling rainbow effect on particles.
ParamTooltips.FrostStrength: Controls how strongly the ice veil (frost) tints the scene. Higher = more frosty/opaque ice look.
ParamTooltips.Depth: Controls how much the under-ice layer contributes (movement/caustics). Higher = more visible depth beneath the ice.
ParamTooltips.VeinStrength: Darkens and adds subtle vein-like structure within the ice. 0 disables the veins.
ParamTooltips.WaterTint: Tint color for the animated under-ice water layer.
ParamTooltips.WaterStrength: Strength of the animated under-ice water refraction and tint. Higher = more visible movement.
ParamTooltips.WaterSpeed: Speed of the under-ice water motion. Higher = faster movement.
ParamTooltips.SheenStrength: Strength of the ice sheen highlight layer. Higher = brighter sheen.
ParamTooltips.SheenTint: Tint color for the sheen highlight layer.
ParamTooltips.ReflectionStrength: Strength of the reflection-like sampling for glossy ice. Higher = stronger reflection.
ParamTooltips.ReflectionDistance: How far the reflection is sampled/offset. Higher = more pronounced reflection shift.
ParamTooltips.ReflectionBlur: Blur applied to the reflection sample. Higher = softer reflection.
ParamTooltips.ReflectionFresnel: Controls how view-angle dependent the reflection is. Higher = tighter, more edge-weighted reflection.

TypeErrors.TypeUnknown: Particle effect '{id}' is of unknown type '{type}', skipping it.
TypeErrors.TypeNotFound: No particle effect found for type: {type}

CustomParticles.NoCustomParticleEffects: No custom particle effects have been created yet.
CustomParticles.TexturePathsPlaceholder: Image paths separated by commmas, Filepicker sequential select supported. Recommended to keep texture sizes as low as possible for performance, 50kb or less preferred.
CustomParticles.Name: Custom Particle Name
CustomParticles.RefreshBrowserContentNew: Would you like to refresh your browser now? The {name} effect will not be available within the Region Particle Effects menu until a refresh occurs.
CustomParticles.RefreshBrowserContentUpdated: Would you like to refresh your browser now? The {name} effect will not be updated within the Region Particle Effects menu until a refresh occurs. Issues may occur if the effect was modified to use different base effect types or texture paths.

Tooltips.Name: Name shown in the FXMaster particle list.
Tooltips.BaseEffect: Choose the motion style. Directional Drift moves particles in a primary direction. Ambient Float spawns particles randomly and lets them drift on-screen.
Tooltips.Group: Which FXMaster category this effect appears under (Weather, Ambient, or Animals).
Tooltips.Textures: One or more image paths, separated by commas. Multiple images will be chosen at random per particle.
Tooltips.Icon: Icon image shown in the particle list.

Errors.TexturesRequired: You must choose at least one image for the particle texture.
Errors.IconRequired: You must choose an icon image for the custom effect.
Errors.InvalidTexture: Texture is not a supported image file: {path}
Errors.InvalidIcon: Icon is not a supported image file: {path}

TypeErrors.TypeUnknown: Filter effect '{id}' is of unknown type '{type}', skipping it.
TypeErrors.TypeNotFound: No filter effect found for type: {type}

AnimationEffect.FilterHint: Filter animations by tag. Where present includes module provider names, a Custom tag for a user-added animation folder, and a Favorites tag for favorited animations.
AnimationEffect.CustomDirectoryHint: A path where your own .webm files live. This requires an Animation Database Refresh.
AnimationEffect.RefreshDbHint: Rebuild the animations database to account for any newly added or removed animations. Optional thumbnail scanning.
AnimationEffect.SearchQueries: Advanced queries supported, ex: (eldritch OR arrow) AND NOT blast
AnimationEffect.RefreshDbError: FXMaster | No animation effects found in FXMaster DB. Wait for the current Animation Scan to complete, or go to 'Module Settings -> FXMaster -> Refresh Animations Database' to re-run the Animation Scan.
AnimationEffect.RefreshDbEmpty: FXMaster | No animation effects present in the FXMaster DB. FXMaster populates animations from your own custom animations folder specified in the module settings, or from providers such as JB2A, Boss Loot, etc. If animations have been added, go to 'Module Settings -> FXMaster -> Refresh Animations Database' to re-run the Animation Scan.
AnimationEffect.ScanCompleteEmpty: FXMaster | Animation Scan Complete - No animation effects found. FXMaster populates animations from your own custom animations folder specified in the module settings, or from providers such as JB2A, Boss Loot, etc.
AnimationEffect.ThumbnailsHint: Enables lookup for animation thumbnails during the Refresh Animations scan. Animation providers that support thumbnail lookup are JB2A and Eskie Effects.
